From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::DrillBit::

"I have just recieved from Dark Mouse, a taped holo message from
KitKat."
He opened the box and let it play. After it was done he spoke.
"She has intrusted me to take care of the 'pack'. I have been named
commander by KitKat. I now ask for those who will stay under my command
to come forward, and those who dont to leave."
He knew he had the horsemen and StarScream on his side, but he wasn't
sure about the others.
